name: Josh Simmons (@josh@josh.tel)
summary:
Attached: 1 image

#Monktoberfest may not mandate masking, but they've been thoughtful about ventilation and vaccines ... and then there's this!

I feel good about one way masking as a high risk person given all the other work they've put in.

Of note, when GitHub Universe did the rug pull on COVID precautions last year, it was Monktoberfest's written promise to not relax protections after they're announced that inspired a key part of the @phpledge@floss.social.

#PublicHealthPledge #HealthAndSafety #COVID #OpenSource #DevRel
